slideInfo.qText: I think the most interesting sport to watch is baseball players.
slideInfo.correctText: Answer: The sentence begins by claiming that it will define which sport is the most interesting sport to watch. However, “baseball players” are not a sport. They are participants in a sport. To make the sentence logical, we simply have to remove the word “players.” This new sentence is completely logical: I think the most interesting sport to watch is baseball.
